readable.title: 3084034954_fe5737197d
readable.content: A man at a casino hugging two colorfully dressed show girls . A man in a white suit is standing with two women . A man stands in the middle of two woman dressed in brightly colored costumes . A white suited man stands between two showgirls in a casino foyer . Two women in very colorful costumes stand next to a man dressed in all white .
